Hero.description: Describe your component. Thunder generates production-ready HTML, CSS, and JS instantly. No frameworks. No bloat. Just pure, clean code.

Features.instantGen_desc: Transform plain text into production-ready code instantly. Our advanced LLM pipeline understands design intent, accessibility standards, and modern best practices.
Features.instantGen_point2: Tailwind CSS or Vanilla CSS support
Features.screenshot_desc: See a design you love? Simply upload a screenshot. Thunder analyzes the layout, typography, and colors to recreate it in pixel-perfect code.
Features.research_desc: Don't just build—understand. Our integrated research agent scrapes the web, summarizes key documentation, and gathers insights to inform your development decisions.
Features.assistant_desc: Stuck on complex logic? The Code Assistant is your specialized pair programmer. It generates functions, optimizes algorithms, and debugs issues on the fly.
Features.assets_desc: Never use generic placeholders again. Generate custom, high-quality assets for your UI directly within the platform. From hero backgrounds to icon sets.
Features.community_desc: Discover what others are building. Share your best creations, get inspired by the community, and fork existing components to jumpstart your project.

Process.description: Three steps from idea to working component.
Process.step1_desc: Type a natural language prompt describing the component you need. Be as specific or as vague as you like.
Process.step2_desc: Our AI instantly produces clean, semantic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript tailored to your exact description.
Process.step3_desc: Preview your component live, refine with follow-up prompts, then copy the code and ship it anywhere.

Philosophy.desc1: We built Thunder because we believe AI should accelerate your workflow, not replace your craft. Every component Thunder generates is readable, maintainable, and dependency-free.
Philosophy.desc2: No black boxes. No vendor lock-in. Just pure, portable code that you own completely.

CTA.desc: Join thousands of developers who build faster with Thunder. Free to start, no credit card required.

DashboardNavbar.lowCreditsDesc2: credits remaining for today. Please use them precisely!

ChatInterface.descReverse: Paste HTML or structure to analyze, refactor, and modernize.
ChatInterface.descReady: Describe the component you want to create or refine.
ChatInterface.sugReady1: A dark hero section with gradient
ChatInterface.sugReady2: A pricing card with hover effect

Workspace.readyDesc: Your generated components will appear here. Use the prompt panel to start building.

PromptBar.placeholder: Describe your component (e.g., 'A login form with glassmorphism effect')

Auth.loginSubtitle: Enter your credentials to access your workspace.
Auth.loginHeroDesc: Join thousands of developers building the next generation of applications with our cutting-edge infrastructure.
Auth.regHeroDesc: Create an account to join the builder community. Access premier tools, connect with other developers, and scale your applications effortlessly.
Auth.regSubtitle: Start building your next big idea today.
Auth.regUsernameHint: Letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores only.
Auth.usernameError: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens

Settings.title: Account Settings
Settings.desc: Manage your personal information and profile settings.
Settings.usernameHint: Used for your public profile URL. Letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores only.
Settings.deleteWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.

Sessions.title: My Sessions
Sessions.desc: A history of all your generated components and designs.
Sessions.noSessionsDesc: You haven't generated any components yet.

Research.title: Deep Research Module
Research.heading: What do you want to learn?
Research.inputPh: Enter a topic (e.g. 'Quantum Computing', 'History of Rome')...

Screenshot.title: Screenshot
Screenshot.dragDrop: Drag & drop or click to browse
